Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/71st
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd, Stony Island, 67th & Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 73rd, Stony Island, 67th, then resume their normal route on Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/71st
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 73rd & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Normal
ShortDescription: WB  79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Normal.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed near Polk
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Polk. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing near Polk due to a signal problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
